summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 23rd Avenue Southwest, from West Spokane Street to West Charlestown Street, by watermains, and amending Sections 2 and 3 of Ordinance No. 46652, entitled: "An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to improve 23rd Avenue Southwest, from West Spokane Street to West Charlestown Street, by constructing a watermain therein, and declaring an emergency", approved March 27, 1924.
